column2: "Jesus Kraest
column4: Abraham ne ba no n'ebusuasantsen nwoma."

column2: "Abraham woo Isaak
column3: na Isaak woo Jakob; na Jakob so woo Juda nye no nuanom;"

column2: "na Juda nye Tamar woo Perez nye Zera; na Perez woo Hezron; na Hezron woo Ram;"
"na Ram woo Amminadab; na Amminadab woo Nahshon; na Nahshon woo Salmon;"
"Salmon nye Rahab woo Boaz; na Boaz nye Rut woo Obed; na Obed woo Jesse;"
"na Jesse woo Ɔhen David. Na David nye nyia nkyɛ ɔyɛ Uria yer no woo Solomon;"
"na Solomon woo Rehoboam; na Rehoboam woo Abija; na Abija woo Asa;"
"Asa woo Jehosafat; na Jehosafat woo Joram; na Joram woo Uzia;"
"na Uzia woo Jotam; na Jotam woo Ahaz; na Ahaz woo Hezekia;"
"na Hezekia woo Manaasɛ; na Manaasɛ woo Amon; na Amon woo Josia;"
"na Josia woo Jekonia nye no nuanom wɔ aber wɔfaa hɔn ndɔmmum kɔr Babilɔn no."
"Na Babilɔn ndɔmmumkɔ ber no ekyir no
column3: Jekonia woo Sealtiel; na Sealtiel woo Zerubabel;"

column2: "na Zerubabel woo Abiud; Abiud woo Eliakim; na Eliakim woo Azor;"
"Azor so woo Sadok; na Sadok woo Akim; na Akim woo Eliud;"
"Eliud woo Eleazar; na Eleazar woo Matan; na Matan woo Jakob;"
"na Jakob woo Josef
column3: Mary a ɔwoo nyia wɔfrɛ no Kraest no no kun no."

column2: "Afei ebusuasantsen a ofi Abraham do besi David do nyina yɛ ebusuasantsen duanan; na ofi David do besi Babilɔn ndɔmmumkɔ ber no do yɛ ebusuasantsen duanan; na ofi Babilɔn ndɔmmumkɔ ber no do besi Kraest no do yɛ ebusuasantsen duanan."
"Na mbrɛ Jesus Kraest n'awoo tse nye yi: ber a wɔdze ne na Mary maa Josef dɛ n'esiwayer
column4: wohun no dɛ onyinsen dza ofi Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn mu no."

column2: "Na no kun Josef yɛ nyimpa tsenenee
column3: na ɔmmpɛ dɛ ogu n'enyim ase bagua mu ntsi
column4: ɔdween dɛ obegyaa no wɔ nsumaa mu."

column2: "Na aber a ɔrodwen yinom ho no
column4: Ewuradze bɔfoe yii noho kyerɛɛ no wɔ adaaso mu see dɛ
column7: mma nnsuro dɛ ebɛfa wo yer Mary aba wo nkyɛn; na dza onyinsen no fi Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn mu."

column2: "Na ɔbɔwo babanyin
column4: osiandɛ ɔno na ɔbɛgye ne man efi hɔn bɔn mu."

column2: "Na yinom nyina ayɛ hɔ
column3: ma dza Ewuradze nam nkɔnhyɛnyi no do kae no aaba mu dɛ

column2: "Na Josef fii nda mu nyanee no
column3: ɔyɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ bɔfo no hyɛɛ no no
column4: na ɔkɛfaa ne yer baa ne nkyɛn;"

column2: "na ɔnnye no ennhyia mu araa dze kodur dɛ ɔwoo babanyin: na ɔtoo no dzin Jesus."
